seller_description: Experience unparalleled audio with Vibeadio Over-Ear Bluetooth Headphones, combining Hybrid Active Noise Cancellation to reduce up to 33dB of noise with a convenient Transparency Mode for situational awareness. Featuring 40mm custom drivers, these headphones deliver deep bass and crystal-clear highs, enhanced by Bluetooth V5.2 for seamless wireless streaming. The advanced microphone system with ENC technology ensures crisp, noise-free calls, ideal for home office or study. Designed for all-day comfort, the lightweight headphones feature breathable protein ear cushions and offer up to 30 hours of playtime in standard mode or 25 hours with ANC. A detachable 3.5mm cable is included for uninterrupted listening. Perfect for travel, work, or relaxation, Vibeadio headphones deliver premium sound, advanced features, and lasting comfort in one sleek design.
review: The last picture is these headphones next to my Sony Wh-1000XM4s. Vibeadio on the left, Sony on the right.The vibeadio headphones are light but not in a cheap way. The sound quality is lovely. I keep my fan at the highest level around this time of year and the active noise cancellation managed to mask it. It definitely cancels out stomping and floor creaks if you live in an apartment.It was easy to connect the headphones to my MacBook Pro. It literally connected in less than a second. It was charged up to 90% straight out the box.It’s big head friendly. It’s a little snug right now but I’m sure it’ll loosen up as I use them more. No ear pain after hours of use.The performance is great, especially for the price. If you’re looking for a more affordable option compared to major brands, get these. I have a pair of Sony WHs so my expectations were low, but I was pleasantly surprised.​
Expected_output: The analysis of the Vibeadio Over-Ear Bluetooth Headphones demonstrates a strong alignment between the seller's description, images, and the buyer's experience. The seller's images accurately represent the sleek and lightweight design of the headphones, as confirmed by the buyer's image, showing the product as advertised. The seller's description of features like Hybrid Active Noise Cancellation, Bluetooth V5.2 connectivity, and comfort-enhancing materials is validated by the buyer's review. The buyer highlights the effective noise cancellation, excellent sound quality, and comfort for extended use, which aligns well with the promises of deep bass, noise-free calls, and durable protein ear cushions. While the buyer initially encountered a defective pair with buzzing in one ear, the seller promptly replaced it, demonstrating good customer service. However, the need for replacement suggests minor quality control issues. Overall, the buyer is satisfied, expressing pleasant surprise at the performance, particularly at this price point. Thus, the seller is not at fault, and the product is recommended for its affordability and performance.
label: 1:Here buyer satisfied with seller
